issue.title: [Python] Make parquet _metadata file accessible from ParquetDataset
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2763](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2763). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently when creating a ParquetDataset it gives you access to the _common_metadata file but not the _metadata file.

We access the metadata file to get row group information of the dataset without opening each footer.
